title: Wage and salary of U.S. employees , by industry 2018
yAxis: Wage and salary in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Wage and salary in U.S. dollars for 22 number of Industrys.

The maximum Wage and salary in U.S. dollars 130777.0 is found at Industry Management of companies and enterprises and the minimum is found at Accommodation and food services where Wage and salary in U.S. dollars is 30403.0.
The highest Industry Management of companies and enterprises has 100374.0 more Wage and salary in U.S. dollars than the lowest Industry Accommodation and food services.
